bioconda.name: diamond
bioconda.summary: Accelerated BLAST compatible local sequence aligner.

biocontainers.name: diamond
biocontainers.summary: Accelerated blast compatible local sequence aligner

biotools.summary: Sequence aligner for protein and translated DNA searches and functions as a drop-in replacement for the NCBI BLAST software tools. It is suitable for protein-protein search as well as DNA-protein search on short reads and longer sequences including contigs and assemblies, providing a speedup of BLAST ranging up to x20,000.

bioschemas.name: Diamond
bioschemas.summary: Sequence aligner for protein and translated DNA searches and functions as a drop-in replacement for the NCBI BLAST software tools. It is suitable for protein-protein search as well as DNA-protein search on short reads and longer sequences including contigs and assemblies, providing a speedup of BLAST ranging up to x20,000.

galaxy.summary: DIAMOND is a new alignment tool for aligning short DNA sequencing reads to a protein reference database such as NCBI-NR.
galaxy.bio_tools_summary: Sequence aligner for protein and translated DNA searches and functions as a drop-in replacement for the NCBI BLAST software tools. It is suitable for protein-protein search as well as DNA-protein search on short reads and longer sequences including contigs and assemblies, providing a speedup of BLAST ranging up to x20,000.
